text: Todor Kavaldzhiev (; 26 January 1934 â€“ 6 February 2019) was a Bulgarian military official, activist and politician. He was the Vice President of Bulgaria from 1997 until 2002 serving alongside President Petar Stoyanov. Kavaldzhiev died on 6 February 2019 in Sofia, Bulgaria, aged 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Bulgaria Category:Bulgarian generals
title: Todor Kavaldzhiev
